channel.title: Time on Max Inden
channel.description: Recent content in Time on Max Inden

item.title: 30th DistSys Reading Group - NTP
item.description: What better way to start a new year than with a paper discussing how to change time? In the 30th session we discussed a paper which I think has much up its sleeves - Attacking the Network Time Protocol. First off the paper gives us a good introduction to the inner working of the network time protocol. Next up it examines the broader ecosystem as well as why we need accurate time in the first place.
